price: ቀሳውስቱና ሊቃውንቱ ከኃጢአት ንግግራቸውና እርምን ከመብላታቸው አይከለክሏቸውም ኖሮአልን ይሠሩት የነበሩት ነገር በጣም ከፋ!
arabic: لَوۡلَا يَنۡهَىٰهُمُ ٱلرَّبَّٰنِيُّونَ وَٱلۡأَحۡبَارُ عَن قَوۡلِهِمُ ٱلۡإِثۡمَ وَأَكۡلِهِمُ ٱلسُّحۡتَۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا كَانُواْ يَصۡنَعُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lawlā yanhāhumu al-rabāniyūna wal-aḥbāru ʿan qawlihimu al-ith'ma wa-aklihimu al-suḥ'ta labi'sa mā kānū yaṣnaʿūna
